aircraft.value: Pelican Cargo - AC-2938-692 at Central Command Hub

defect_observed.value: Ballistics computer calculation error. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Ammunition Feed component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 17/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 18/04/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 20/04/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 23/04/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 26/04/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
